pli-tv-bu-vb-sk69:1.25: Sabbamidaṁ carimaṁ katan. Sp-ṭ.3.1.647: yaṁ amhehi tīhi janehi kataṁ, sabbamidaṁ kiccaṁ lāmakaṁ nimmariyādaṁ adhammikaṁ, “What the three of us have done is all low, outside of acceptable bounds, and unrighteous.”
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk69:1.27.1: The attribution of speakers is according to Sp.2.647.
